item.description:
Do you have questions about sex that you are afraid to ask? Curious about? Curious how others feel? Herb will create a safe environment to ask whatever you want about sexuality, how to ask for what you want with another person, when to take risks, how to listen to another, how to deal with differences, how to deal with sexual "problems", optional ways to express sexuality, how sex relates to connection and bonding, male/female different perspectives on sexuality, stages of sexuality, how to have safe sex, how to deal with raging hormones, how to deal with difficulties around sexual pleasure, etc.

Herb is a therapist and relationship coach, specializing working with couples, for 30 years. He has been a sex therapist and educator in the past and still deals with sexual issues with couples and clients.

Traditional cost of Herb's workshops has been $40 and Herb is offering this with sliding scale from $20-40. Snacks will be provided and you are also welcome to bring vegetarian snacks and drinks.

Herb Pearce
781 648 3737
www.herbpearce.com
www.meetup.com/Enneagram-Group
www.meetup.com/The-Arlington-Singles-Events
item.name: Everything You've Ever Wanted to Know or Ask about Sex
